float_constant.name: CAMERA_POSITION_X
float_constant.desc: Sets camera x position in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_POSITION_Y
float_constant.desc: Sets camera y position in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_POSITION_Z
float_constant.desc: Sets camera z position in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_X
float_constant.desc: Sets camera x focus (target position) in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_Y
float_constant.desc: Sets camera y focus (target position) in region coordinates

float_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_Z
float_constant.desc: Sets camera z focus (target position) in region coordinates

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_ALL
integer_constant.desc: Send the message to attachments on every point

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_INVERT_POINTS
integer_constant.desc: Invert how the attachment points list should be treated

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_OBJECT_CREATOR
integer_constant.desc: Send only to those have the same CreatorID with host object CreatorID

integer_constant.name: OS_ATTACH_MSG_SCRIPT_CREATOR
integer_constant.desc: Send only to those have the same CreatorID with sender script CreatorID

integer_constant.name: CHANGED_REGION_RESTART
integer_constant.desc: Parameter of changed event handler used to indicate the region has been restarted.

integer_constant.name: CHANGED_ANIMATION
integer_constant.desc: The set of animations playing on the avatar to whom this object is attached has been changed.

integer_constant.name: LIST_STAT_HARMONIC_MEAN
integer_constant.desc: Returns the harmonic mean of a list of numbers, Value 100.

integer_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_OFFSET_X
integer_constant.desc: Adjusts the camera focus x position relative to the target. (float)

integer_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_OFFSET_Y
integer_constant.desc: Adjusts the camera focus y position relative to the target. (float)

integer_constant.name: CAMERA_FOCUS_OFFSET_Z
integer_constant.desc: Adjusts the camera focus z position relative to the target. (float)

integer_constant.name: OS_NPC
integer_constant.desc: Target is NPC. Use this instead of NPC, Value 0x01000000

integer_constant.name: OS_LISTEN_REGEX_NAME
integer_constant.desc: Process name parameter as regex, Value = 0x1

integer_constant.name: OS_LISTEN_REGEX_MESSAGE
integer_constant.desc: Process name parameter as regex, Value = 0x2

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINKSET_TYPE_CONSTRAINT
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;Links are created with physics constraint objects. Used for flexible objects. Not a good default as it uses more CPU

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINKSET_TYPE_COMPOUND
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;Linkset is constructed as a compound object made up of the shapes of all the children. The most efficient linkset implementation and the default

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINKSET_TYPE_MANUAL
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;NOT IMPLEMENTED. Linkset is implemented by CPU code that moves each of the object in the linkset independently

integer_constant.name: PHYS_LINK_TYPE_FIXED
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;Link is fixed and unmovable. Default. Implemented as a 6 degree-of-freedom constraint with no motion in either the linear or angular directions

integer_constant.name: PHYS_AXIS_ALL
integer_constant.desc: Bulletsim;(-1) make changes to all axis

integer_constant.name: OSTPOBJ_STOPATTARRGET
integer_constant.desc: Flag for osTeleportObject, object is stopped at destination

integer_constant.name: OSTPOBJ_STOPONFAIL
integer_constant.desc: Flag for osTeleportObject, object stops at start point if tp fails (still does nothing)

integer_constant.name: OSTPOBJ_SETROT
integer_constant.desc: Flag for osTeleportObject, the rotation is the final object rotation, otherwise is a added rotation

integer_constant.name: AGENT_LIST_EXCLUDENPC
integer_constant.desc: Bit mask option to llGetAgentList scope to exclude NPCs

function.name: osAddAgentToGroup
function.desc: osAddAgentToGroup(key avatar, string group_name, string role_name);Adds the avatar to a group under a given role

function.name: osAgentSaveAppearance
function.desc: key osAgentSaveAppearance(key avatar, string notecard);Creates a notecard with the specified avatar's current appearance inside the object

function.name: osAvatarName2Key
function.desc: key osAvatarName2Key(string firstname, string lastname);Returns the avatar's key from their first and last name

function.name: osAvatarPlayAnimation
function.desc: osAvatarPlayAnimation(key avatar, string animation);Plays a given animation on a specified avatar.;No PERMISSION_TRIGGER_ANIMATION check.

function.name: osAvatarStopAnimation
function.desc: osAvatarStopAnimation(key UUID, string animation);Stops playing an animation on a specified avatar

function.name: osCauseDamage
function.desc: osCauseDamage(key avatar, float damage);Causes health damage to the specified avatar

function.name: osCauseHealing
function.desc: osCauseHealing(key avatar, float healing);Increase health to the specified avatar

function.name: osCheckODE
function.desc: integer osCheckODE(); Checks if physics engine is legacy ODE and returns 1 ( TRUE ) it is, or 0 ( FALSE ) if not

function.name: osClearInertia
function.desc: osClearInertia();clears the effect of osSetInertia* functions. Link set total mass, center of mass and inertia will be the values estimated by default from the link set parts.

function.name: osCollisionSound
function.desc: osCollisionSound(string impact_sound, double impact_volume);Sets collision sound to impact_sound with specified volume.

function.name: osConsoleCommand
function.desc: osConsoleCommand(string command);Sends a given console command to the region.;NOTE: There are no security checks with this function. DO NOT USE THIS FUNCTION UNLESS YOU ARE ABSOLUTELY SURE YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING.

function.name: osDie
function.desc: osDie(key objectUUID);Deletes an object depending on the target uuid. Note: Only allow osDie() on objects rezzed by the script prim Group (linkset) or on it self.

function.name: osDrawEllipse
function.desc: osDrawEllipse(string draw_list, integer width, integer height);Draws an ellipse on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawFilledEllipse
function.desc: string osDrawFilledEllipse(string drawList, integer width, integer height);Appends an FillEllipse drawing command to the string provided in drawList and returns the result. The filled ellipse is drawn with the current pen size and color, with the specified width and height (in pixels), centered on a point which is (width/2) pixels to the right of the pen's current X position, and (height/2) pixels below the pen's current Y position. After the filled ellipse is drawn, the width and height values are added to the pen's X and Y position, respectively.

function.name: osDrawFilledPolygon
function.desc: string osDrawFilledPolygon (string draw_list, list x, list y);Draws a polygon on a dynamic texture, and fills it with the current pen color

function.name: osDrawFilledRectangle
function.desc: string osDrawFilledRectangle(string draw_list, integer width, integer height);Draws a rectangle on a dynamic texture, and fills it with the current pen color

function.name: osDrawImage
function.desc: string osDrawImage(string draw_list, integer width, integer height, string url);Retrieves a specified image and draws it at the specified height and width

function.name: osDrawLine
function.desc: string osDrawLine(string draw_list, integer start_x, integer start_y, integer end_x, integer end_y);osDrawLine(string draw_list, integer end_x, integer end_y);Draws a line on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawPolygon
function.desc: string osDrawPolygon (string draw_list, list x, list y);Draws a polygon on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawRectangle
function.desc: string osDrawRectangle(string draw_list, integer width, integer height);Draws a rectangle on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawResetTransform
function.desc: string osDrawResetTransform(string drawList);No description available yet

function.name: osDrawRotationTransform
function.desc: string osDrawRotationTransform(string drawList, float x);No description available yet

function.name: osDrawScaleTransform
function.desc: string osDrawScaleTransform(string drawList, float x, float y);No description available yet

function.name: osDrawText
function.desc: string osDrawText(string draw_list, string text);Renders text on a dynamic texture

function.name: osDrawTranslationTransform
function.desc: string osDrawTranslationTransform(string drawList, float x, float y);No description available yet

function.name: osDropAttachment
function.desc: osDropAttachment();Drops an attachment

function.name: osDropAttachmentAt
function.desc: osDropAttachmentAt(vector pos, rotation rot);Drops an attachment at a given position and rotation

function.name: osEjectFromGroup
function.desc: integer osEjectFromGroup(key avatar);Eject the specified avatar from the object's current group

function.name: osForceAttachToAvatar
function.desc: osForceAttachToAvatar(integer attach_point);Attaches the object to the avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osForceAttachToAvatarFromInventory
function.desc: osForceAttachToAvatarFromInventory(string item, integer attach_point);Attaches given inventory item to the avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osForceAttachToOtherAvatarFromInventory
function.desc: osForceAttachToOtherAvatarFromInventory(key avatar, string item, integer attach_point);Attaches given inventory item to a specified avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osForceBreakAllLinks
function.desc: osForceBreakAllLinks();Identical to llBreakAllLinks() except that it doesn't require the link permission to be granted. Delinks all prims in the link set.

function.name: osForceBreakLink
function.desc: osForceBreakLink(integer link);to llBreakLink(integer link) except that it doesn't require the link permission to be granted. Delinks the prim with the given link number in a linked object set.

function.name: osForceCreateLink
function.desc: osForceCreateLink(key target, int parent);Idential to llCreateLink() except that it doesn't require the link permission to be granted. Attempt to link the script's object with target.

function.name: osForceDetachFromAvatar
function.desc: osForceDetachFromAvatar();Detaches the object from the avatar.;No PERMISSION_ATTACH check.

function.name: osForceDropAttachment
function.desc: osForceDropAttachment();Drops an attachment without a PERMISSION_ATTACH check

function.name: osForceDropAttachmentAt
function.desc: osForceDropAttachmentAt(vector pos, rotation rot);Drops an attachment at a given position and rotation without a PERMISSION_ATTACH check

function.name: osForceOtherSit
function.desc: osForceOtherSit(key avatar, key target); Forces a sit of targeted avatar onto itself or another Prim

function.name: osFormatString
function.desc: string osFormatString(string to_format, list strings);Formats the given string using specified parameters

function.name: osGetAgentIP
function.desc: string osGetAgentIP(key avatar);Returns the agent's IP Address

function.name: osGetAgents
function.desc: list osGetAgents();Returns a list of all avatars in the current region

function.name: osGetAvatarHomeURI
function.desc: string osGetAvatarHomeURI(key uuid); Returns the Home URI of an avatar

function.name: osGetAvatarList
function.desc: list osGetAvatarList();Returns a list with the keys, position, and name of each avatar in the current region

function.name: osGetCurrentSunHour
function.desc: float osGetCurrentSunHour();Returns the value of the current region's sun hour

function.name: osGetDrawStringSize
function.desc: osGetDrawStringSize(string contentType, string text, string fontName, integer fontSize);Returns a vector containing the horizontal and vertical dimensions in pixels of the specified text

function.name: osGetGender
function.desc: string osGetGender(key id);Returns a string with one of the following values: 'male', 'female', or 'unknown'. This value is determined by the value selected for the avatar shape in the appearance dialog in the user's viewer. If that value cannot be found for any reason (avatar is not in the region, improperly formatted key, etc.), 'unknown' is returned.

function.name: osGetGridCustom
function.desc: string osGetGridCustom();Returns the current grid's GridInfo key

function.name: osGetGridGatekeeperURI
function.desc: string osGetGridGatekeeperURI();Returns the current grid's Gatekeeper URI as a string.

function.name: osGetGridHomeURI
function.desc: string osGetGridHomeURI();Returns the current grid's HomeURI

function.name: osGetGridLoginURI
function.desc: string osGetGridLoginURI();Returns the current grid's LoginURI

function.name: osGetGridName
function.desc: string osGetGridName();Returns the current grid's name

function.name: osGetGridNick
function.desc: string osGetGridNick();Returns the current grid's nickname

function.name: osGetHealRate
function.desc: float osGetHealRate(key avatar);Gets the current automatic healing rate in % per second. Default heal rate is now around 0.5% per second. A value of zero can disable automatic heal, current maximum value is 100 % per second.

function.name: osGetHealth
function.desc: osGetHealth(key avatar);Return the target avatar's health

function.name: osGetInertiaData
function.desc: list osGetInertiaData();Returns list of Intertia Data

function.name: osGetInventoryDesc
function.desc: string osGetInventoryDesc(string name);Returns the description of inventory item

function.name: osGetLinkNumber
function.desc: integer osGetLinkNumber(string name);Returns the link number of the prim or sitting avatar with name 'name' on the link set or -1 if the name is not found.

function.name: osGetLinkPrimitiveParams
function.desc: list osGetLinkPrimitiveParams(integer link_num, list parameters);Returns prim params for the prim specified by link_num

function.name: osGetMapTexture
function.desc: key osGetMapTexture();Returns the map texture key for the current region

function.name: osGetNotecard
function.desc: string osGetNotecard(string notecard);Returns the full contents of a notecard

function.name: osGetNotecardLine
function.desc: string osGetNotecardLine(string notecard, integer line);Returns a given line in a specified notecard contained in the object

function.name: osGetNpcList
function.desc: list osGetNpcList();Returns a strided list of the UUID, position, and name of each NPC in the region.

function.name: osGetNumberOfAttachments
function.desc: list osGetNumberOfAttachments(key avatar, list attach_point);Returns a strided list of the specified attachment points and the number of attachments on those points

function.name: osGetNumberOfNotecardLines
function.desc: integer osGetNumberOfNotecardLines(string notecard);Returns the number of lines in a notecard

function.name: osGetPhysicsEngineName
function.desc: string osGetPhysicsEngineName();This function returns a string containing the name and version number of the physics engine.

function.name: osGetPhysicsEngineType
function.desc: string osGetPhysicsEngineType();This function returns a string containing the name of the Physics Engine.

function.name: osGetPrimitiveParams
function.desc: list osGetPrimitiveParams(key prim, list parameters);Returns the parameters of a primitive, specified by its key

function.name: osGetRegionMapTexture
function.desc: key osGetRegionMapTexture(string region);Returns the map texture key for a specified region

function.name: osGetRegionSize
function.desc: vector osGetRegionSize(); Returns size of region in meters as vector

function.name: osGetRegionStats
function.desc: list osGetRegionStats();Returns the current region' statistics

function.name: osGetRezzingObject
function.desc: key osGetRezzingObject();Returns the key of the object's parent object

function.name: osGetScriptEngineName
function.desc: string osGetScriptEngineName();Returns the name of the script engine running on the current region

function.name: osGetSimulatorMemory
function.desc: integer osGetSimulatorMemory();Returns the memory in use by the current region

function.name: osGetSimulatorMemoryKB
function.desc: integer osGetSimulatorMemoryKB();Returns the memory in use in KB by the current region

function.name: osGetSimulatorVersion
function.desc: string osGetSimulatorVersion();Returns the current simulator version

function.name: osGetSunParam
function.desc: string osGetSunParam(string param);Returns region's current sun parameters.;Param are: day_length, year_length, day_night_offset, update_interval.

function.name: osGetTerrainHeight
function.desc: integer osGetTerrainHeight(integer x, integer y);Returns the current region's terrain height as a float at the given coordinates

function.name: osGetThreatLevel
function.desc: string osGetThreatLevel();Returns the current scripting threat level

function.name: osGetWindParam
function.desc: string osGetWindParam(string plugin, string param);Gets the value of param property for plugin module.;SimpleRandomWind plugin param is: strength.;ConfigurableWind plugin params are: avgStrength, avgDirection, varStrength, varDirection, rateChange.

function.name: osInviteToGroup
function.desc: integer osInviteToGroup(key avatar);Invited the specified avatar to the object's current group

function.name: osIsNpc
function.desc: integer osIsNpc(key npc);Returns 1 if TRUE, 0 if FALSE

function.name: osIsUUID
function.desc: osIsUUID(string);Returns 1 if the given string is a valid UUID, 0 if not

function.name: osKey2Name
function.desc: string osKey2Name(key avatar);Returns the avatar's name from their key

function.name: osKickAvatar
function.desc: osKickAvatar(string FirstName, string LastName, string alert);Kicks specified avatar out of the current region

function.name: osList2Double
function.desc: osList2Double(list src, integer index);This function converts a value in the specified index of the list src to the double data type. However, OSSL does not have a double data type. C# contains a double type, but the current LSL implementation does not.

function.name: osListenRegex
function.desc: osListenRegex(integer channel, string name, string id, string msg, integer regex_bitfield);Filter listen events by regex

function.name: osLoadedCreationDate
function.desc: string osLoadedCreationDate();Returns the creation date of the current region

function.name: osLoadedCreationID
function.desc: string osLoadedCreationID();Returns the original UUID of the current region

function.name: osLoadedCreationTime
function.desc: string osLoadedCreationTime();Returns the creation time of the current region

function.name: osMakeNotecard
function.desc: osMakeNotecard(string notecard, list contents);Creates a notecard with contents of list

function.name: osMatchString
function.desc: list osMatchString(string to_match, string pattern, integer start);Returns a list containing the matches from the specified string

function.name: osMax
function.desc: float osMax(float x, float y);Returns the greater of two numbers

function.name: osMessageAttachments
function.desc: osMessageAttachments(key avatar, string message, list attach_point, integer flags);Sends a given message to the specified avatar's attachments on the given attachment points

function.name: osMessageObject
function.desc: osMessageObject(key object, string msg);Sends a specified message to an object

function.name: osMin
function.desc: float osMin(float x, float y);Returns the lesser of two numbers

function.name: osMovePen
function.desc: osMovePen(string draw_list, integer x, integer y);Moves the pen's location to the coordinates specified by the x and y parameters, without drawing anything

function.name: osNpcCreate
function.desc: key osNpcCreate(string firstname, string lastname, vector position, string clone);key osNpcCreate(string firstname, string lastname, vector position, string clone, integer options);Creates an NPC

function.name: osNpcGetOwner
function.desc: key osNpcGetOwner(key npc);Returns the avatar key for the target NPC's owner

function.name: osNpcGetPos
function.desc: vector osNpcGetPos(key npc);Returns current position vector of the target NPC

function.name: osNpcGetRot
function.desc: rotation osNpcGetRot(key npc);Returns the rotation of the the target NPC

function.name: osNpcLoadAppearance
function.desc: osNpcLoadAppearance(key npc, string notecard);Load the target NPC's appearance from a notecard

function.name: osNpcMoveTo
function.desc: osNpcMoveTo(key npc, vector position);Moves the target NPC to a location within the region

function.name: osNpcMoveToTarget
function.desc: osNpcMoveToTarget(key npc, vector target, integer options);Moves the target NPC to a specified location over a period of time

function.name: osNpcPlayAnimation
function.desc: osNpcPlayAnimation(key npc, string animation);Plays animation on the target NPC

function.name: osNpcRemove
function.desc: key osNpcRemove(key npc);Removes the NPC specified by key npc

function.name: osNpcSaveAppearance
function.desc: osNpcSaveAppearance(key npc, string notecard);Save the target NPC's current appearance to a notecard in the object's inventory

function.name: osNpcSay
function.desc: osNpcSay(key npc, string message);Target NPC says message on the nearby chat channel

function.name: osNpcSetProfileAbout
function.desc: osNpcSetProfileAbout(key npc, string about);Set about in created NPC's profile.

function.name: osNpcSetProfileImage
function.desc: osNpcSetProfileImage(key npc, string image);Set image in created NPC's profile.

function.name: osNpcSetRot
function.desc: osNpcSetRot(key npc, rotation rot);Set the rotation of the target NPC

function.name: osNpcShout
function.desc: osNpcShout(key npc, string message);Target NPC shouts message on the nearby chat channel

function.name: osNpcSit
function.desc: osNpcSit(key npc, key object, integer options);Makes the target NPC sit on an object

function.name: osNpcStand
function.desc: osNpcStand(key npc);Makes the target NPC stand up

function.name: osNpcStopAnimation
function.desc: osNpcStopAnimation(key npc, string animation);Stops animation being played by the NPC

function.name: osNpcStopMoveToTarget
function.desc: osNpcStopMoveToTarget(key npc);Stop the target NPC's movement

function.name: osNpcTouch
function.desc: osNpcTouch(key npcKey, key object_key, integer link_num);Makes the target NPC to touch the specified object

function.name: osNpcWhisper
function.desc: osNpcWhisper(key npc, string message);Target NPC whispers message on the nearby chat channel

function.name: osOwnerSaveAppearance
function.desc: key osOwnerSaveAppearance(string notecard);Creates a notecard with the object owner's current appearance inside the object

function.name: osParcelJoin
function.desc: osParcelJoin(vector start, vector end);Joins two adjacent parcels within the same region

function.name: osParcelSubdivide
function.desc: osParcelSubdivide(vector start, vector end);Subdivides a parcel into two adjacent parcels within the same region

function.name: osParseJSON
function.desc: string osParseJSON(string JSON);Returns a hashtable containing the structured JSON contents

function.name: osParseJSONNew
function.desc: string osParseJSON(string JSON);Returns a hashtable containing the structured JSON contents

function.name: osRegexIsMatch
function.desc: osRegexIsMatch(string input, string pattern);Returns 1 if the input string matches the regular expression pattern, returns 0 if not

function.name: osRegionNotice
function.desc: osRegionNotice(string msg);Sends a region notice throughout the current region

function.name: osRegionRestart
function.desc: osRegionRestart(float seconds);Restarts the current region after a specified amount of time (in seconds)

function.name: osReplaceString
function.desc: string isReplaceString(string in);Replaces a given string

function.name: osRequestSecureURL
function.desc: osRequestSecureURL(list options);Requests one HTTPS:// url (opensim version 0.9 or over)

function.name: osRequestURL
function.desc: osRequestURL(list options);Requests one HTTP:// url (opensim version 0.9 or over)

function.name: osReturnObject
function.desc: osReturnObject(key avatar);Returns object to a specified avatar

function.name: osReturnObjects
function.desc: osReturnObjects(integer param);Returns a group of objects

function.name: osRezObject
function.desc: osRezObject(string inventory, vector position, vector velocity, rotation rot, integer param, integer rez_at_root_, integer do_recoil, integer set_die_at_edge, integer check_pos);Rez an object

function.name: osSetContentType
function.desc: osSetContentType(key id, string type);Sets a content return type for a llRequestUrl()

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureData
function.desc: osSetDynamicTextureData(key dynamicID, string contentType, string data, string extraParams, integer timer);Renders a dynamically created texture on the prim containing the script and returns the UUID of the newly created texture

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureDataBlendFace
function.desc: string osSetDynamicTextureDataBlendFace(string dynamicID, string contentType, string data, string extraParams, integer blend, integer disp, integer timer, integer alpha, integer face);Returns UUID of the generated texture. Intended to be used with subsequent calls to osSetDynamicTexture* functions in order to modify the texture

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureDataFace
function.desc: string osSetDynamicTextureDataFace(string dynamicID, string contentType, string data, string extraParams, int timer, int face);No description available yet

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURL
function.desc: string osSetDynamicTextureURL(key dynamicID, string contentType, string url, string extraParams, integer timer);Renders a web texture on the prim containing the script and returns the UUID of the newly created texture

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlend
function.desc: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlend(key dynamicID, string contentType, string url, string extraParams, integer timer, integer alpha);Allows for two dynamic textures to blend on the prim containing this script

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlend
function.desc: string osSetDynamicTextureDataBlend(string dynamicID, string contentType, string data, string extraParams, integer timer, integer alpha);Allows for two dynamic textures to blend on the prim containing this script

function.name: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlendFace
function.desc: osSetDynamicTextureURLBlendFace(key dynamicID, string contentType, string url, string extraParams, integer blend, integer disp, integer timer, integer alpha, integer face);Allows for two dynamic textures to blend on the specified face of the prim containing this script

function.name: osSetEstateSunSettings
function.desc: osSetEstateSunSettings(integer sunFixed, float sunHour);Set current estate's sun settings

function.name: osSetFontName
function.desc: osSetFontName(string draw_list, string font_name);Sets the font to be used by osDrawText

function.name: osSetFontSize
function.desc: osSetFontSize(string draw_list, integer font_size);Sets the font size to be used in osDrawText

function.name: osSetHealRate
function.desc: osSetHealRate(key avatar, float healrate);Sets the automatic healing rate in % per second. Default heal rate is now around 0.5% per second. A value of zero can disable automatic heal, current maximum value is 100 % per second.

function.name: osSetHealth
function.desc: osSetHealth(key avatar, float health);Sets avatars health

function.name: osSetInertia
function.desc: osSetInertia(float mass, vector centerOfMass, vector principalInertiaScaled, rotation InertiaRot);Allows creators to set the major physics dynamic proprieties, replacing the values estimated from the linkset parts. Call osClearInertia to undo.

function.name: osSetInertiaAsBox
function.desc: osSetInertiaAsBox(float mass, vector boxSize, vector centerOfMass, rotation rot);Allows creators to set the link set total mass, center of mass and moment of inertia. Moment of inertia will be the one of a box of size boxSize, placed at the center of mass and rotated by rot in the root prim local frame. Call osClearInertia to undo.

function.name: osSetInertiaAsCylinder
function.desc: osSetInertiaAsCylinder(float mass, float radius, float length, vector centerOfMass, rotation rot);Allows creators to set the link set total mass, center of mass and moment of inertia. Moment of inertia will be the one of a cylinder of radius and length, placed at the center of mass and rotated by rot in the root prim local frame. Call osClearInertia to undo.

function.name: osSetInertiaAsSphere
function.desc: osSetInertiaAsSphere(float mass, float radius, vector centerOfMass);Allows creators to set the link set total mass, center of mass and moment of inertia. Moment of inertia will be the one of a sphere of radius radius, placed at the center of mass. Call osClearInertia to undo.

function.name: osSetParcelDetails
function.desc: osSetParcelDetails(vector pos, list parameters);Sets parcel details;PARCEL_DETAILS_NAME, PARCEL_DETAILS_DESC, PARCEL_DETAILS_OWNER, PARCEL_DETAILS_GROUP, PARCEL_DETAILS_CLAIMDATE are implemented

function.name: osSetParcelMediaURL
function.desc: osSetParcelMediaURL(string url);Set parcel media to a given url

function.name: osSetParcelSIPaddress
function.desc: osSetParcelSIPAddress(string SIPAddress);Set parcel SIP Address for voice

function.name: osSetPenCap
function.desc: osSetPenCap(string draw_list, string direction, string type);Apply a shape on the end of a line

function.name: osSetPenColor
function.desc: osSetPenColor(string draw_list, string color);Sets the pen color to be used when drawing dynamic textures

function.name: osSetPenSize
function.desc: osSetPenSize(string draw_list, integer pen_size);Sets the line thickness to be used when drawing dynamic textures

function.name: osSetPrimFloatOnWater
function.desc: osSetPrimFloatOnWater(integer float);Set physical object to float at the given water level

function.name: osSetPrimitiveParams
function.desc: osSetPrimitiveParams(key prim, list parameters);Sets the primitive parameters for the given primitive

function.name: osSetProjectionParams
function.desc: osSetProjectionParams(integer projection, key texture, float fov, float focus, float ambience);;osSetProjectionParams(key prim, integer projection, key texture, float fov, float focus, float ambience);Sets the project parameters for the given primitive

function.name: osSetRegionSunSettings
function.desc: osSetRegionSunSettings(integer useEstateSun, integer sunFixed, float sunHour);Set the current region's sun settings

function.name: osSetRegionWaterHeight
function.desc: osSetRegionWaterHeight(float height);Adjusts water height in current region

function.name: osSetSpeed
function.desc: osSetSpeed(key avatar, float modifier);Modify the speed of movement for the given avatar

function.name: osSetSunParam
function.desc: osSetSunParam(string param, float value);Sets the current region's sun parameters.;Param are: day_length, year_length, day_night_offset, update_interval.

function.name: osSetTerrainHeight
function.desc: osSetTerrainHeight(integer x, integer y, float val);Sets the current region's terrain height at the given coordinates

function.name: osSetTerrainTexture
function.desc: osSetTerrainTexture(integer level, key texture);Set the terrain texture for the current region to a given texture

function.name: osSetTerrainTextureHeight
function.desc: osSetTerrainTextureHeight(integer corner, float low, float high);Set the terrain texture height for the current region

function.name: osSetWindParam
function.desc: osSetWindParam(string plugin, string param, float value);Sets value of param property for plugin module.;SimpleRandomWind plugin param is: strength.;ConfigurableWind plugin params are: avgStrength, avgDirection, varStrength, varDirection, rateChange

function.name: osShutDown
function.desc: osShutDown();Shuts down the current simulator

function.name: osTeleportAgent
function.desc: osTeleportAgent(key agent, integer regionX, integer regionY, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportAgent(key agent, string regionName, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportAgent(key agent, vector position, vector lookat);Teleports an agent to the specified location

function.name: osTeleportObject
function.desc: integer osTeleportObject(key objectUUID, vector targetPos, rotation rot, int flags);No dedication available yet

function.name: osTeleportOwner
function.desc: osTeleportOwner(integer regionX, integer regionY, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportOwner(string regionName, vector position, vector lookat);;osTeleportOwner(vector position, vector lookat);Teleports the owner of the object containing the script to the specified location

function.name: osTerrainFlush
function.desc: osTerrainFlush();Updates terrain changes in the grid's database

function.name: osUnixTimeToTimestamp
function.desc: string osUnixTimeToTimestamp(integer time);Returns unix time as a formatted timestamp

function.desc: string osWindActiveModelPluginName();Returns active wind plugin name, specified by "wind_plugin" in OpenSim.ini

function.desc: lsSetWindlightScene(list parameters);Sets the Lightshare scene

function.desc: lsSetWindlightSceneTargeted(list parameters, key avatar);Sets the Lightshare scene for a given avatar

function.desc: lsClearWindlightScene();Remove Windlight settings from a region
